Events that occurred on 6 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 235.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to G.S. Rigby Jr..
1994 - The War of the Jewels is published in the US.
1996 - The Peoples of Middle-earth is published in the US.
2002 - The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers Photo Guide is published.
2002 - The Fellowship of the Ring is released in the EU for PlayStation 2.
2016 - Actor Peter Vaughan dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
